      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)

        Parameters:

      • appendText

        private void appendText(java.lang.String str)
        Appends text to the output text.
        Parameters:
        str - : Text to be appends

      • onCheck

        private void onCheck()
        Show role of the highlighted player in the chat log and send action to the server.

      • onVote

        private void onVote()
        Vote action. Increase the number of votes against the highlighted player if that player is alive and send action to the server.

      • onKill

        private void onKill()
        Kill action of the witch , can be done once per turn. The highlighted player will be selected and send action to server.

      • onSkip

        private void onSkip()
        Skip current move or do nothing on this turn and send action to server.

      • onHunt

        private void onHunt()
        Hunt action of werewolf during night phase. Increase the number of votes against the highlighted player and send action to server.

      • onHeal

        private void onHeal()
        Heal action of the witch during night phase. Heal the highlighted player and send action to server.

      • hostGame

        public boolean hostGame(int port,
                        java.lang.String IPAddress)
                 throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Create new server to host the game and create parallel a client that assigned to this GUI
        Parameters:
        port - : port of server
        IPAddress - : IP of server
        Returns:
        true if success else false
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException
